column1: Feature: Create New Sales Order in Dynamics 365 with Entity and Shipping Details â€” Scenario: Create and validate a new sales order using flowing steps 1. Navigate to https://sitg.crm.dynamics.com  2. Enter user name ${CRM_USERNAME} and click Next 3. enter Password as ${CRM_PASSWORD} and click Sign in 4. Click "Yes" on stay signed in page 5. On the SANDBOX page and Click on div containg Zones Sales & Service 6. Click on list item with text exactly matching "Orders".
